name: Federal Highways Road Construction
description: The Federal Executive is ordered to: - do all in its power to build up the Federal Highways district to a proper designed and functional road - the highway shall:    - be at the same height as the capital    - include bridges and/or tunnels where needed - make regulations for the precise design of the highways - hire Federal Civil Servants to assist in the work of constuction. - be responsible for the work the civil Servants do including verification that all regulations and laws are followed in the process of constructing the highways - give out seperate contracts with own payment for constuction of tunnels and bridges, in case they determine those are needed - choose and apply the road payout via moving some amount of currency into the appropiate Federal Infrastructure Payout accountsFederal Civil Servents shall: - recieve a standard payment for laying down both stone roads and asphalt

properties.Title: Stone Road (Tracking)
properties.UserDescription: Track payment for placement of and fee for removal of stone roads.

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Constructed</ecoicon>: Was the block constructed or deconstructed?

Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ConstructOrDeconstruct">Action Location</ecoicon>: The position where the interaction took place.

When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

properties.Title: Stone Ramp (Tracking)
properties.UserDescription: Track payment for placement of and fee for removal of stone ramps. Note that the logic here is specifically designed to counteract a game bug with stone ramps (issue #19473).
